vas3k/TaxHacker

Analyzes receipts and invoices with LLMs

View on index · View in 3D Map

Related repos

  • Organizes receipts using Llama models
  • Process manager using LLMs to analyze and roast system activity
  • Tracks bills and splits expenses
  • React components for billing and subscription management
  • Papers and resources for LLM-based agent research, including surveys and key developments
  • Open-source tax filing application for the Federal 1040 form
  • advanced RAG techniques and agentic workflows for LLMs
